title: Architecture Studio Kim | Web develoPer
description: Discover ask-archi.com, an online portfolio dedicated to the work of Jungsoo Kim, an accomplished architect based in Germany. The website presents his architectural projects, professional milestones, and career journey, offering an insightful look into his expertise.
name: ask-archi.com

children.value: An online portfolio dedicated to the work of Jungsoo Kim, an accomplished architect based in Germany. The website presents his architectural projects, professional milestones, and career journey, offering an insightful look into his expertise.

I focused on creating a user-friendly and visually engaging experience, ensuring the website effectively highlights Jungsoo Kim's exceptional work. With seamless navigation and intuitive functionality, ask-archi.com is designed to provide an optimal browsing experience for both architecture enthusiasts and potential clients.
